name: Jishogi - Puzzle Demo
description:
Jishogi is an upcoming puzzle/walking simulator game. The main character, Otonashi Mayu, is a Shogi(Japanese chess) prodigy, forced into a battle of wills with an evil witch. The game centers around her exploring her mind and revisiting her memories, having to solve puzzles in order to gain access to them. More information about the plot, gameplay, and other things, are available on the kickstarter page:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lrgames/jishogi-a-dark-and-exploratory-puzz...

This demo is for the puzzle gameplay only, as the early parts of main story are not yet in a graphically complete state.

Please check out the Kickstarter if you came here from Itch!
